ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains selected neonatal severe infection.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with selected neonatal severe infection. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the "Diagnosis" category or the attribute of "Diagnoses" for Encounter category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes that identify patients who have selected neonatal severe infection.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
